mapper.select: SELECT ASSET_NM AS fxaNm ,SUBSTRING(ASSET_NO, 4,9) AS fxaNo ,CASE WHEN DEAKT = '0000-00-00' THEN 'USE' ELSE 'DSU' END AS fxaStCd ,WBS1 AS wbsCd ,D.TEAM_DEPT_CODE AS deptCd ,CAST(CAST(ASSET_CLAS AS INT) AS NVARCHAR(4)) AS fxaClss ,PERNR AS crgrId ,CAST(CAST(MENGE AS FLOAT) AS INT) AS fxaQty ,MEINS AS fxaUtmNm ,REPLACE(ACQR_BAL, ',','') AS obtPce ,REPLACE(BOOK_AMT, ',','') AS bkpPce ,CONVERT (DATE, ACQR_DT) AS obtDt ,ASSET_TEXT AS useUsf ,CASE WHEN DEAKT = '0000-00-00' THEN '' ELSE DEAKT END AS dsuDt FROM IRIS_FXAINFO_IF A LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_SSO_USER B ON B.SA_SABUN_NEW = A.PERNR LEFT OUTER JOIN VW_SSO_DEPT D ON D.DEPT_CODE = B.SA_DEPT_NEW

SELECT '000'+B.FXA_NO as fxaNo ,A.FROM_WBS_CD as fromWbsCd ,A.FROM_CRGR_ID as fromCrgrId ,A.TO_WBS_CD as toWbsCd ,A.TO_CRGR_ID as toCrgrId FROM IRIS_FXA_TRSF_LIST A INNER JOIN IRIS_FXA_INFO_MST B ON B.FXA_INFO_ID = A.FXA_INFO_ID WHERE 1=1 AND TRSF_ST_CD = 'APPR' AND A.LAST_MDFY_DT > DATEADD(MI,-60,GETDATE())
mapper.update: MERGE IRIS_WBS_PJT_IF MEM USING ( SELECT #{wbsCd} AS WBS_CD ) AS Tab1 ON (MEM.WBS_CD = Tab1.WBS_CD) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PRJ_NM = #{prjNm} ,LAST_MDFY_DT = GETDATE() ,LAST_MDFY_ID = 'batch' WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( WBS_CD ,PRJ_NM ,FRST_RGST_DT ,FRST_RGST_ID ,LAST_MDFY_DT ,LAST_MDFY_ID) VALUES ( #{wbsCd} ,#{prjNm} ,GETDATE() ,'batch' ,GETDATE() ,'batch' );
